value:
Grado is responsible for the war.
The only way to restore peace is
to stop them, and so stop the war.

I was born near the Renais border,
so I heard my fair share of rumors
about King Fado and his family.

Moments before he was sentenced to
death, my mentor informed me of the
plot to destroy the Sacred Stones.

Neither Emperor Vigarde nor Prince
Lyon are themselves... A demon has
driven Grado to madness.

Do you think our prayers reach our
gods even from this world? ...Don't
answer. I'd rather believe they do.

Let us pray and give thanks for
friends like $Nf...

What happens to me is not important.
My only wish is to excise evil and
return light to Grado!

Is anyone hurt? I can attend
to any wounds...

Please! Grant me the strength
I require!

For me? Thank you. I will use
it with care.

I am Natasha, a cleric from Grado.
I have little skill beyond prayer, but
if I can help in any way, I will.

You wonder why I put myself on
the field of battle despite being
a simple cleric.$k$pI betrayed my country to spread
news of the changes in Grado.
My mentor...didn't make it out.$k$pAll I could do was work to heal those
wounded in war against Grado. Only
to then send them back out to war...$k$pSo, I am drawn to the battlefield
to repent for the blood shed.
Purely selfish reasons.$k$pI must atone for my sin eventually,
in one way or another. When the
time comes, will you stand by me?
はあっ
Stop this.
きゃあっ
Unacceptable...
Repent.
I will protect you.
Sacred light, protect us!
I will do my best.
The world must have light.
Hehe...
You are saved.
Believe in me.
My name is Natasha. I was a servant of the people at Grado's Imperial Temple.
The emperor is not himself. You all MUST be able to see that!
If we are able to save and rebuild Grado, I don't care what happens to me.
Please! Grant me strength. The strength to tell the truth...
So, you are the light that guides Heroes to this world...
Guide me.
Please wait!
I will follow.
